sub_title: Professor and chair Health Economics section, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam
summary:
Health Economist with an interest in institutional economics and applied health econometrics/biostatistics. In my work I'm keen to combine both in quantitative research and health economic policy.

For Talma/VU, I conduct health economic research in the area of methods for performance measurement, efficiency, equity, and policy evaluation, both at the health care system and provider level.

For SiRM/Equalis, I advise government and all healthcare stakeholders on health economic policy and research.
